metadata.dc:author: Bravo Ortiz, M F
Escudero Nafs, A
Tejada Rivas, A
García Alvarez, J C
Polo Usaola, C
metadata.dc:description: The present study investigate several socio-demographics, clinical and therapeutics factors that converge in the emergencies of the Psychiatric Hospital of Madrid on June, 1989 and 1990. Also, the study approach the changes about the demand of attendance, experienced by these emergencies during the period 1979-1990, related to the introduction of a sectorized care organization through the comparison with similar studies realize in the same Hospital. Is studied the function of these changes in the progressive reordering of the population demand.
metadata.dc:title: Variación de la demanda en la urgencia del Hospital Psiquiátrico de Madrid.
[Variation of the demand in the emergency of the Psychiatric Hospital of Madrid].
metadata.dc:publisher: Actas luso-espanolas de neurologia, psiquiatria y ciencias afines
